name: Crab's CaSEAno
description:
Play a game of dice against an oblivious clam! You can use slight-of-claw to manipulate the die as they land, but don't get too greedy! You could get caught!

Rolling your dice on the multipliers will give you more score! The difference between you and the clam's scores will be added/subtracted from your points, which you can spend in the shop for more dice! 

Get flashy and use your points to buy cosmetic dice. This will make the clam feel inferior!
